name: Elmo Nathaniel
text: Nivarti is a true professional and a resourceful change leader who can deliver on great outcomes.

text: It's my pleasure to share a feedback about my Coach Nivarti Jayaram.Nivarti is a wonderful Action oriented Coach and highly focuses on my inner strength and goes deeper.
